name: kentucky-fried-chicken-no-longer-fried-for-free-freebies-wtf
title: Kentucky Fried Chicken, No Longer Fried, For Free? [Freebies] [WTF]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded: KFC seems to be having an identity crisis, and they’re asking America to “unthink what you thought about KFC” by getting a free piece of some freakish looking food that resembles a grilled dismembered chicken (but we can’t be certain) today. Anyone brave enough to visit a KFC and check out what’s in that bucket is our hero. Thanks to @tarajackson for the tip!
